en.command_not_found:
Command not found
Press "Help" to show available commands
Type /help for advanced usage
en.ddos_error: You cannot send commands faster than once in {0} seconds
en.start_introduce:
Hello!
I am @RaiWalletBot ‚Äì your Telegram bot to manage RaiBlocks cryptocurrency
en.start_basic_commands:
Here are some basic commands to control your wallet
Press "Account" to show account & check balance
Press "Price" to show Mrai (XRB) market price
Press "Send" to start sending

Current fee for outcoming transaction: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*{2}Current minimum to receive: *1 Mrai (XRB)*
Current minimum to send: *{1} Mrai (XRB) + fee*

for advanced commands type /help
en.start_learn_more:
Learn more about RaiBlocks cryptocurrency & earn some free Mrai (XRB) at [raiblockscommunity.net](https://raiblockscommunity.net) or in group @RaiBlocks!
Trading: [BitGrail](https://bitgrail.com/market/BTC-XRB), [Mercatox](https://mercatox.com/exchange), @RaiBlocksTradeBot, @RaiBlocksTrade, more options coming soon!..

1 user = 1 xrb\_account
THE BOT IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND THE AUTHOR DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS BOT. YOU ASSUME THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR ACTIONS, AND NO REFUNDS WILL BE ISSUED
en.help_learn_more:
Learn more about RaiBlocks cryptocurrency & earn some free Mrai (XRB) at [raiblockscommunity.net](https://raiblockscommunity.net) or in group @RaiBlocks!
Trading: [BitGrail](https://bitgrail.com/market/BTC-XRB), [Mercatox](https://mercatox.com/exchange), @RaiBlocksTradeBot, @RaiBlocksTrade, more options coming soon!..

Any suggestions or bugs? Contact me @SergSW
THE BOT IS PROVIDED "AS IS". 1 user = 1 xrb\_account
en.help_advanced_usage:
For basic commands press "Help" button
Here are some advanced commands to control your wallet 
 /help ‚Äî receive list of available commands
 /account ‚Äî create account, show account & check balance
 /block\_count ‚Äî check our wallet is up-to-date!
 /send amount xrb\_account optional\_pass ‚Äî send Mrai (XRB) to other xrb\_account
 /password HereYourPass  ‚Äî protect account with password
 /password\_delete HereYourPass ‚Äî delete existing password
 /price ‚Äî show Mrai (XRB) market price

Current fee for outcoming transaction: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*{2}Current minimum to receive: *1 Mrai (XRB)*
Current minimum to send: *{1} Mrai (XRB) + fee*
en.account_balance_zero: Your balance is *0 Mrai (XRB)*. Send some Mrai (XRB) to your account or claim with hourly [RaiBlocks faucet]({0}{1})
en.account_balance_low: Your balance: *{2} Mrai (XRB)*. It is less than current fee {3} Mrai (XRB) + minimal send {4} Mrai (XRB). Send some Mrai (XRB) to your account or claim with hourly [RaiBlocks faucet]({0}{1})
en.account_balance:
Your balance: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*
~ {1} BTC
Send limit: {2} Mrai (XRB)
en.account_history:
[account in explorer ‚Äî history]({1}{0})
[distribution ‚Äî earn with hourly faucet]({2}{0})
en.account_created: We create new RaiBlocks account for you! Your account
en.account_balance_start:
Your start balance is 0 Mrai (XRB). "This account does not exist on the blockchain yet" means that you did not receive any Mrai (XRB) yet.
Send some Mrai (XRB) to your account or claim with hourly [RaiBlocks faucet]({0}{1})
en.account_error: Error creating account. Try again later
en.send_low_balance: Your balance is too small to send. Current fee: {0} Mrai (XRB). Minimal send: {1} Mrai (XRB)
en.send_limit_max: You cannot send more than your balance ‚Äì {0} Mrai (XRB) fee. Your current limit: {1} Mrai (XRB)
en.send_limit_min: You cannot send less than minimum {0} Mrai (XRB)
en.send_user_not_found: User {0} not found. Perhaps he does not have account in @RaiWalletBot. Invite him!
en.send_completed: Transaction completed. Fee: {0} Mrai (XRB). Your current balance: *{1} Mrai (XRB)*. Transaction hash
en.send_tx_error: Transaction failed. Try again later. Your current balance: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*
en.send_error: Failed to send. Try again later
en.send_password: Password you entered is incorrent. Type your password to confirm transaction
en.send_frontier: As additional level of protection we check your last transaction hash at raiblockscommunity.net. Your last block was not found at website yet. Try send later
en.send_digits: Send amount must contain Integer ONLY
en.send_no_account: You do not have RaiBlocks account yet. Type /account to begin
en.send_no_account_text: You do not have RaiBlocks account yet. Press "Account" to begin
en.send_amount: Please specify amount of Mrai (XRB) you want to send. Current fee: {0} Mrai (XRB). Minimal send: {1} Mrai (XRB)
en.send_destination: Please specify destination xrb\_account or @UserName (starts with @ sign) or upload QR code (clean, best quality image)
en.send_confirm:
Confirm you want to send *{0} Mrai (XRB)* to *{2}*
It will cost you *{1} Mrai (XRB)* with fees

Last (Mercatox): *{0} BTC*

en.qr_recognize_error: Sorry, but I cannot recognize your QR code
en.qr_account_error: Sorry, but I cannot find xrb\_account in your QR code

Now your account is protected with password!
*DO NOT FORGET password, we cannot help you, if you lose it!
Delete all messages with password so no one can retrieve pass from history!*
en.password_uppercase: Password must include UPPERCASE letters, lowercase letters and digits
en.password_short: Your password is too short, please enter a longer password and try again. Password must be at least 8 characters including uppercase letters, lowercase letters and digits
en.password_not_empty:
You should delete old password before set new. Use command:
/password\_delete HereYourPass
en.password_delete_success:
Your old password was successfully deleted. Use this command to set new password:
/password HereYourPass

en.language_error: Failed to set new. language Try again later

id.command_not_found:
Perintah tidak ditemukan
Press "Bantuan" untuk menampilkan perintah yang tersedia
Type /help untuk penggunaan lanjutan
id.ddos_error: Anda tidak dapat mengirim perintah lebih cepat dari satu kali dalam {0} detik
id.start_introduce:
Hello!
Saya @RaiWalletBot ‚Äì bot Telegram Anda untuk mengelola RaiBlocks cryptocurrency
id.start_basic_commands:
Berikut adalah beberapa perintah dasar untuk mengendalikan dompet Anda
Tekan "Akun" Untuk menunjukkan akun & cek saldo
Tekan "Harga" Untuk menunjukkan pasar Mrai (XRB)
Tekan "Kirim" Untuk memulai mengirim

Biaya saat ini untuk transaksi keluar: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*{2}Minimum saat ini untuk menerima: *1 Mrai (XRB)*
Minimum saat ini untuk mengirim: *{1} Mrai (XRB) + biaya*

Untuk tipe perintah lebih lanjut /help
id.start_learn_more:
Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang RaiBlocks cryptocurrency & memperoleh beberapa Mrai gratis (XRB) di [raiblockscommunity.net](https://raiblockscommunity.net) atau di grup @RaiBlocks!
Trading: [BitGrail](https://bitgrail.com/market/BTC-XRB), [Mercatox](https://mercatox.com/exchange), @RaiblocksTradeBot, @RaiblocksTrade, Lebih banyak pilihan segera hadir!.. 

1 user = 1 xrb\_akun
THE BOT IS PROVIDED "AS IS" DAN PENULIS MENYATAKAN SEMUA JAMINAN DENGAN HUBUNGAN INI. ANDA BERTANGGUNG JAWAB ATAS TINDAKAN ANDA, DAN TIDAK ADA PENGEMBALIAN AKAN DIPERHATIKAN
id.help_learn_more:
Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang RaiBlocks cryptocurrency & memperoleh beberapa Mrai gratis (XRB) di [raiblockscommunity.net](https://raiblockscommunity.net) atau di grup @RaiBlocks!
Trading: [BitGrail](https://bitgrail.com/market/BTC-XRB), [Mercatox](https://mercatox.com/exchange), @RaiBlocksTradeBot, @RaiBlocksTrade, Lebih banyak pilihan segera hadir!..

THE BOT IS PROVIDED "AS IS". 1 user = 1 xrb\_akun
id.help_advanced_usage:
Untuk perintah dasar tekan "Bantuan" button
Berikut adalah beberapa perintah lanjutan untuk mengontrol dompet Anda 
 /help ‚Äì daftar perintah yang tersedia
 /account ‚Äì buat akun, tampilkan akun & cek saldo 
 /block\_count ‚Äì Cek dompet kami sudah di update!
/send jumlah xrb\_akun optional\_pass ‚Äì kirim Mrai (XRB) ke xrb lainnya\_account
/password HereYourPass ‚Äì Lindungi akun dengan kata sandi
/password\_delete HereYourPass ‚Äì hapus kata sandi
/price ‚Äì tampilkan Mrai (XRB) pasar 

Biaya saat ini untuk transaksi keluar: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*{2}Minimum saat ini untuk menerima: *1 Mrai (XRB)*
Minimum saat ini untuk mengirim: *{1} Mrai (XRB) + biaya*
id.account_balance_zero: Saldo anda *0 Mrai (XRB)*. Kirimkan beberapa Mrai (XRB) ke akun Anda atau klaim dengan per jam [keran RaiBlock]]({0} {1})
id.account_balance_low: Saldo anda *{2}Mrai (XRB)*. Ini kurang dari biaya saat ini {3} Mrai (XRB) + Minimal kirim {4} Mrai (XRB). Kirimkan beberapa Mrai (XRB) ke akun Anda atau
id.account_balance:
Saldo: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*
~ {1} BTC
Batas kirim: {2} Mrai (XRB)
id.account_history:
[pencarian akun ‚Äì riwayat]({1}{0})
[distribusi ‚Äì dapatkan faucet setiap jam]({2}{0})
id.account_created: Kami membuat akun RaiBlock baru untuk Anda! Akun Anda
id.account_balance_start:
Saldo awal anda 0 Mrai (XRB). "Akun ini belum ada di blockchain" ("This account does not exist on the blockchain yet") Berarti kamu tidak menerima apapun Mrai (XRB) yet.
Kirimkan beberapa Mrai (XRB) ke akun anda atau klaim setiap jam [RaiBlocks faucet]({0}{1})
id.account_error: Kesalahan membuat akun Coba lagi nanti
id.send_low_balance: Saldo Anda terlalu kecil untuk dikirim. Biaya saat ini: {0} Mrai (XRB). Minimal kirim: {1} Mrai (XRB)
id.send_limit_max: Anda tidak dapat mengirim lebih dari saldo Anda ‚Äì {0} Mrai (XRB) fee. Batas Anda saat ini: {1} Mrai (XRB)
id.send_limit_min: Anda tidak dapat mengirim kurang dari minimum {0} Mrai (XRB)
id.send_user_not_found: Pengguna {0} tidak ditemukan. Mungkin dia tidak memiliki akun @RaiWalletBot.  Ajaklah dia!
id.send_completed: Transaksi selesai. Biaya: {0} Mrai (XRB). Saldo Anda saat ini: *{1} Mrai (XRB)*. Hash transaksi
id.send_tx_error: Transaksi gagal. Coba lagi nanti. saldo anda saat ini: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*
id.send_password: Kata sandi yang Anda masukkan salah. Ketik kata sandi anda untuk konfirmasi transaksi
id.send_frontier: Sebagai tingkat perlindungan tambahan, kami memeriksa hash transaksi terakhir Anda di raiblockscommunity.net. Blok terakhir Anda belum ditemukan di situs web. Coba kirim nanti
id.send_digits: Jumlah kirim hanya boleh berisi bilangan bulat
id.send_no_account: Anda belum memiliki akun RaiBlocks. Tulis /account untuk memulai
id.send_no_account_text: Anda belum memiliki akun RaiBlocks. Tekan "Akun" untuk memulai
id.send_amount: Harap tentukan jumlah Mrai (XRB) yang ingin Anda kirim. Biaya saat ini: {0} Mrai (XRB). Minimal kirim: {1} Mrai (XRB)
id.send_destination: Harap tentukan tujuan xrb\_akun atau @UserName (dimulai dengan tanda @) atau unggah kode QR (gambar kualitas bersih dan terbaik)
id.send_confirm:
Konfirmasikan bahwa Anda ingin mengirim *{0} Mrai (XRB)* to *{2}*
Ini akan dikenakan biaya *{1} Mrai (XRB)* dengan biaya

it.start_introduce:
Ciao!
Sono @RaiWalletBot ‚Äì il tuo bot Telegram per usare la criptomoneta RaiBlocks
it.start_basic_commands:
Ecco alcuni comandi di base per controllare il tuo portafoglio
Premi "Account" per mostrare l'account e controllare il saldo
Premi "Prezzo" per mostrare il valore di mercato di Mrai (XRB)
Premi "Invia" per inviare denaro

Commissione attuale per le transazioni in uscita: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*{2}Attuale importo minimo ricevibile: *1 Mrai (XRB)*
Attuale importo minimo inviabile: *{1} Mrai (XRB) + fee*

per i comandi avanzati digitare /help
it.start_learn_more:
Impara di pi√π su RaiBlocks e ricevi qualche Mrai (XRB) gratis su [raiblockscommunity.net](https://raiblockscommunity.net) o nel gruppo @RaiBlocks!
Per fare trading: [BitGrail](https://bitgrail.com/market/BTC-XRB), [Mercatox](https://mercatox.com/exchange), @RaiBlocksTradeBot, @RaiBlocksTrade, e altri in arrivo!..

1 utente = 1 xrb\_account
IL BOT E' FORNITO "COSI' COM'E'" E GLI AUTORI NON FORNISCONO ALCUNA GARANZIA RIGUARDO AD ESSO. L'UTENTE SI ASSUME LA RESPANSABILITA' PER LE PROPRIE AZIONI, E NESSUN RIMBORSO SARA' CONCESSO

it.help_advanced_usage:
Per i comandi di base premi il tasto "Aiuto" 
Ecco alcuni comandi avanzati per controllare il tuo portafoglio 
 /help ‚Äî visualizza la lista dei comandi disponibili
 /account ‚Äî crea un account, mostra l'account & visualizza il saldo
 /block\_count ‚Äî controlla se il portafoglio √® sincronizzato!
 /send importo xrb\_account opzionale\_pass ‚Äî invia Mrai (XRB) ad un altro xrb\_account
 /password InserisciQuiTuaPassword  ‚Äî proteggi l'account con una password
 /password\_delete InserisciQuiTuaPassword ‚Äî elimina la password attuale
 /price ‚Äî mostra  il valore di mercato di Mrai (XRB)

Commissione attuale per le transazioni in uscita: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*{2}Attuale importo minimo ricevibile: *1 Mrai (XRB)*
Attuale importo minimo inviabile: *{1} Mrai (XRB) + fee*
it.account_balance_zero: Il tuo saldo √® *0 Mrai (XRB)*. Invia alcuni Mrai (XRB) al tuo account o richiedine ogni ora col [faucet RaiBlocks]({0}{1})
it.account_balance_low: Il tuo saldo: *{2} Mrai (XRB)*. E' inferiore alla commisione attuale {3} Mrai (XRB) + importo minimo inviabile {4} Mrai (XRB).  Invia alcuni Mrai (XRB) al tuo account o richiedine ogni ora col [faucet RaiBlocks]({0}{1})
it.account_balance:
Il tuo saldo: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*
~ {1} BTC
Limite di invio: {2} Mrai (XRB)
it.account_history:
[explorer dell'account ‚Äî cronologia]({1}{0})
[distributione ‚Äî guadagna ogni ora col faucet]({2}{0})
it.account_created: Abbiamo creato un nuovo account RaiBlocks per te! Il tuo account
it.account_balance_start:
Il tuo saldo iniziale √® 0 Mrai (XRB). "Questo account non esiste ancora sulla blockchain" ("This account does not exist on the blockchain yet") significa che non hai ancora ricevuto nessun Mrai (XRB) yet.
Invia alcuni Mrai (XRB) al tuo account o richiedine ogni ora col [faucet RaiBlocks]({0}{1})
it.account_error: Errore durante la creazione dell'account. Riprova pi√π tardi
it.send_low_balance: Il tuo saldo √® troppo basso per inviare. Commisisone attuale: {0} Mrai (XRB). Importo minimo inviabile: {1} Mrai (XRB)
it.send_limit_max: Non puoi inviare un importo inferiore al tuo saldo ‚Äì {0} Mrai (XRB) di commissione. Il tuo limite attuale: {1} Mrai (XRB)
it.send_limit_min: Non puoi inviare meno di {0} Mrai (XRB)
it.send_user: Utente {0} trovato. Ecco il suo account: {1}
it.send_user_not_found: Utente {0} non trovato. Forse non ha un account su @RaiWalletBot. Invitalo!
it.send_completed: Transazione completata. Commissione: {0} Mrai (XRB). Il tuo saldo attuale: *{1} Mrai (XRB)*. Hash della transazione
it.send_tx_error: Transazione fallita. Riprovare pi√π tardi. Il tuo saldo attuale: *{0} Mrai (XRB)*
it.send_password: La password inserita non √® corretta. Digita la tua password per confermare la transazione
